summary: Before dying a man makes his best friend promise not to marry his dominant wife after he is gone. When he does it anyway, the first husband comes back as a ghost to give some action to the newly weds.
cast: Emma Penella|Fernando Fernán Gómez|Fernando Rey|Luz Márquez|Antonio Riquelme|Mercedes Muñoz Sampedro|Xan das Bolas|Alfonso Godá|Goyo Lebrero|Manuel Requena|Ana María Ventura|Lola Gaos|Ana María Alberta|José Luis López Vázquez|Ángel Álvarez|Félix Briones|Emilio Alonso|Nuria Torray|Modesto Blanch|Jaime Blanch|Rafael Cortés
title: Un marido de ida y vuelta
